job.title: Marketing Data Analyst
job.description:
As a
Marketing Data Analyst
for LovelySkin, you see the threads connecting trends in our marketing data and instinctively know how to dissect data to help facilitate decision-making. You’re the bridge between the creative to the analytics. You’ll be directly responsible for driving strategic thinking, analysis and customer insights for acquisitions, customer relationship management, business development and financial planning. By providing weekly and monthly business reports, you will assist in managing and optimizing testing and targeting efforts while recommending enhancements for online and offline channels of marketing.
At LovelySkin, we’re proud of our family-grown roots, and with over 120 employees in 20 departments, we’re a highly collaborative team doing amazing things. LovelySkin has grown to be one of the largest skincare and beauty websites in the country. We’re committed to providing our customers with outstanding customer service, quick delivery, an appealing shopping experience and the most comprehensive offering of physician-grade skincare and beauty products available. We are also committed to provide our team members with the opportunity to make an impact, to work with great people, enjoy excellent benefits, and to have the best tools available to do their work well.
As a company with roots in science and medical research, our employees’ health and safety are our number one priority. LovelySkin’s policy is that all employees be fully vaccinated for Covid-19 prior to their first day of employment.
What You’ll Love Doing Everyday
Provide multi-channel reporting and analysis on marketing campaigns to ensure data-driven decisions are supporting business goals and objectives.
Build and generate reports from multiple external and internal data sources, creating actionable trend information, and ensuring that the company president and team members have the information necessary to make informed business decisions.
Analyze performance data to get a full picture of customers, predict market trends and customer behavior, personalize and sharpen customer engagements, and measure campaign effectiveness in real time.
Supports Merchandising/Marketing Planning calendar and automates performance reports pertaining to marketing campaigns and web analytics.
Performs competitive analysis within and outside of the industry, translating findings into strategic roadmap initiatives.
Provide recommendations on additional reporting strategies and business intelligence methodologies to ensure data is timely, actionable and accurate.
Respond to and quickly turnaround ad hoc reporting requests.
What You Bring To The Table
Bachelor’s degree in Marketing, Finance, Mathematics or equivalent.
5+ years of experience in a data analysis/scientist role, experience in e-commerce preferred.
Proficiency in database querying (SQL) and data base structures (SQL Server) preferred
Expert Microsoft Excel skills (pivot tables, macros, etc.)
Hands on experience in implementing BI tools or enterprise wide analytics structure
Ability to work in a fast-paced environment, quick learner and endlessly inquisitive
Highly self-motivated, ability to work independently, think creatively, and detail oriented
Must be willing to work onsite at our location in Omaha, NE
How we’re taking care of our people at LovelySkin:
Fantastic benefits (medical, dental, vision, etc.)
Competitive salaries and wages! Annual bonus!
401K with generous match AND profit sharing
Generous employee discount on all products and services
Hassle-free paid time off with holidays and a flexible workstyle
Relaxed, collaborative atmosphere with a casual dress code.
Awesome culture including social gatherings, holiday parties, competitive costume contests and company luncheons
At LovelySkin and Skin Specialists, we don’t just accept difference- we celebrate it, we support it, and we thrive on it for the benefit of our employees, our patients and customers, and our community. LovelySkin and Skin Specialists is honored to be an equal opportunity workplace and proud to provide a livable wage for all employees.
